synopsis: PxChar_t* PxStrncpy(char *d, char const *s, PxSize_t n);

arguments.name: d
arguments.description: Address to copy the string to

arguments.name: s
arguments.description: Address to copy the string from

arguments.name: n
arguments.description: Maximal count of characters in strings to copy

description.short: Copy a string with fixed length

long.text: PxStrncpy copies at most "n" characters. If "s" has more than "n" characters, it is truncated to that length and the result is not null terminated.
